name: New Pisces
description:
New Pisces is out now:





PC: http://www.mediafire.com/download/9da8it6j1808j9b/new-pisces-1.6-win.zip
Mac: http://www.mediafire.com/download/o7s7y3mhqvvlo03/new-pisces-1.6-mac.zip
Linux: http://www.mediafire.com/download/lzkke1owds2h5wu/new-pisces-1.6-linux.tar.bz2



Ages 13+ for strong language.

Thread on Lemmasoft Forum: http://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=11&t=31419

---



This is my first completed game. Having a deadline was a massive help for me to actually get something finished!



It's a short story about writing horoscopes and the technological singularity. It's also kind of a rhythm game.
I did the coding, story, art and some of the music. Big thanks to Urban Fox for the exclusive track which you can hear at the beginning.
In the coming days I will add some of my thoughts and some technical information on my blog. This is the first release by sleepy agents which is the name of my game dev studio - which isn't much more than me and a laptop at the moment!



---



2 Endings
Interactive Audio - the music will be different depending on your choices and the timing of your choices
Approx. 20 minutes long / 2000 words



---



I'd love to receive any feedback. Can you read the text OK? Does this work on Linux and Mac? I haven't been able to test on those operating systems!
Also would you say this is "too experimental" or "not experimental enough" for your tastes?

Twitter @sleepyagents

---

Android

If anybody would rather play on android I have now uploaded an APK.

http://www.mediafire.com/download/910lqw45y94fn07/NewPisces-1.9-release.apk

Or to download through the play store please join the play test Google group: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/sleepyplaytest
And once joined you can download through the play store here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.sleepyagents.newpisces

This APK is a beta, I have not optimised for mobile devices so I won't be putting this on the public play store. I'll consider this in the future, but for now I'm shifting focus to my other game which will have a full android release.
